Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $24.99 - $16.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:01:02 UTC – Details)


Design, build, topple! Have a blast and learn to make domino art with this set of 100 dominoes and accessories from Lily Hevesh, the #1 Domino artist in the world! Domino Creations includes easy-to-follow directions with full-color photographs that will have you building awesome chain reaction designs in no time. Keep on building! Dominoes measure 24mm x 7.5mm x 48mm.
DOMINOES GAME AND ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: This H5 Domino Creations by Lily Hevesh set includes 100 colorful dominoes, accessories and easy-to-follow instructions.
DESIGN COUNTLESS BUILDS: This complete dominoes set allows you to build numerous custom domino art creations. Dominoes measure 24mm x 7.5mm x 48mm.
PERFECT FOR A FAMILY GAME NIGHT: Kids and adults alike will enjoy creating design projects and watching them tumble. Set ’em up and knock ’em down.
STEAM-BASED HOBBY AND ART FORM: Domino Creation kids game encourages critical thinking, math skills and so much more. For 1 or more players, ages 5 and up.
FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY: Next time you get together with family and friends, bring along a Spin Master game. The perfect activity for memorable game nights, birthdays, dinner parties, vacations, holiday & Christmas gifts, and any time you just want to have fun.
Includes: 100 Dominoes, 2 Half-Bridges, 3 Fieldstarters, 1 Template, Instructions
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details

Read more

H5 Domino Creations

100-Piece Domino Set by Lily Hevesh

Design, build, topple! Have a blast and learn to make domino art with this set of 100 dominoes and accessories from Lily Hevesh, the #1 Domino artist in the world! Domino Creations includes easy-to-follow directions with full-color photographs that will have you building awesome chain reaction designs in no time. Keep on building!

  • 100 Dominoes
  • 2 Half-Bridges
  • 3 Fieldstarters
  • 1 Template
  • Instruction Sheets

Read more

Design Countless Builds

The H5 Domino Creations by Lily Hevesh set includes 100 colorful dominoes, accessories and easy-to-follow instructions for you to build numerous custom domino art creations.

Indoor Activity for the Whole Family

Domino Creations includes easy-to-follow directions with full-color photographs that will have you building awesome chain reaction designs in no time. Keep on building!

STEM Based Hobby and Art Form

Domino Creations encourages critical thinking, math skills and so much more. For 1 or more players, ages 5 and up.

From the brand

Click on the image to buyï¼

Power Tools Series

Phalanx 180W rotary tool- Powerful motor brings better performance improvement.

Lithium Battery Series

Long-lasting battery support range, PHALANX universal battery pack for all products requiring lithium batteries.

Lawn&Garden Series

PHALANX gardening tools series, let every gardening enthusiast enjoy the pleasant process of garden design.

PHALANX is a United States brand specializes in electric & pneumatic power tools, garden tools, auto tools and hand tools for home improvements.

We believe excellently designed tools could be your trusted life partner and powerful workmate in your life anywhere and anytime. PHALANX possess a number of series of easy-to-use, on the go lightweight, fashion orientated tools, that with strong power system, and portable Li-lon battery solution.

Special gift for DIYerï¼Please note: The chuck needs to be tightened with a spanner before use.
ã€180W & 6-Speed Adjustmentã€‘Our rotary tool equipped with a powerful 180w motor, 8000~32000RPM, 6-speed adjustment, refined gear adjustment to make the speed of each speed more stable. From cutting metal to polishing jewelry, it all cover, do what you want!
ã€Flexible Shaft Like a Penã€‘Want to have more functions? The flexible shaft is your best helper for both fine work and corner polishing. We make the flexible shaft cause less runout and provide stable output . Play with inspiration, easy to make DIY!
ã€More Compatibilityã€‘This power rotary tool is compatible with all sizes of collets, equipped with 1/8″, 1/16″, 3/32″, 3/25″, more stable when fixing accessories for grinding, cutting, wood carving, sanding, engraving, etc. It is ideal for diversified work.
ã€Low Noise/Vent/Gear Protect Blocker Designã€‘Comfortable and stable handle, lower noise,Innovation design blockers prevent from unintend touch over speed gear, ventilation holes on the side to discharge heat and increase service life.
ã€Ideal Choiceã€‘DIY or gift, PHALANX is your best choice. we provide a one-year warranty and complete after-sales service, including 180w rotary tool, 139 accessories, 1 storage box , a 16 page manual. Trust and try us.

The idea of PHALANX tools comes from the ease we’d like to provide a simple and enjoyable process for each user. The idea of PHALANX tools comes from our desire to provide an easy and pleasant working process for every user. PHALANX, use inspiration to create possibilities.

PHALANX 180w rotary tool kit has a powerful power system and versatile performance. We equip you with 139 accessories and a 6-speed control system to meet your needs more precisely. Since it is so highly adaptable, a rotary tool can be used in a wide range of DIY projects. Try substituting a rotary tool for other power tools like drills, sanders and electric saws, especially when you need fine motor control for small, tight spaces and projects.

  • This rotary tool kit comes with 139 pieces of accessories that supportï¼šengraving/polishing/carving/cutting/drilling/grinding/sanding
  • Tip: When replacing parts, make sure to tighten the collet with a spanner!!! When tightened, the accessories will not come off during use.

  • 6-speed adjustable knob.
  • Innovation design blockers prevent from unintend touch over speed gear

  • The pen-like flex shaft assists you in all kinds of delicate work, allowing your creativity to unfold.
  • Flex shaft of this power rotary tool is about 41.94in.

  • Ventilation holes on the side to discharge heat and increase service life.

Read more

Armed with a rotary tool alone, you can complete the following projects:

  • Carve designs into wood, stone or metal surfaces.
  • Cut and sand wood or plastic.
  • Etch mirrors or glass, including windowpanes, tumblers and glass tables.
  • Cut tile for installing plumbing or for custom backsplashes and flooring.
  • Cut sheet metal into unique shapes to create jewelry, home decor or custom home repairs.
  • Sharpen knives, chainsaws or other blades.
  • Polish jewelry and devices, including laptops and smartphones.
  • Remove rust from devices and metal appliances.

Specifications:

  • Rated Power: 180W
  • Voltage: 120V
  • No Loading Speed: 8000-32000RPM
  • Adjustable Speed: 6 Speeds

Read more

When assembling the parts, please check if the parts and components fit perfectly to avoid some unnecessary risks.

!!!Tip: When replacing parts, make sure to tighten the collet with a spanner!!!

When tightened, the accessories will not come off during use.
